attributes.action: Reopen all UK pubs with alcohol for Christmas fortnight 17/12/20 #PUBLIVESMATTER
attributes.additional_details: It's the Great British thing to do.
attributes.background: Allow all UK pubs fully licensed to reopen for the Christmas fortnight from 17/12/20 up to and including New Years Day 2021, without restrictions or alcohol limits. Wet pubs, food serving pubs, all tiers, all four nations. Wales, England, Scotland, N.Ireland.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign these petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560947
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325069
